sources.title: Phantom Thunderbolt (1933) KEN MAYNARD
sources.description: A town that is being threatened by outlaws hires a cowboy called The Thunderbolt Kid to handle their railway dispute.

sources.title: Phantom Thunderbolt
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Phantom Thunderbolt (1933) KEN MAYNARD
sources.description:
Stars: Ken Maynard, Frances Lee, Frank Rice 
Director: Alan James

A cowboy called The Thunderbolt Kid comes to the aid of a town that is being threatened by outlaws who don't want a railroad to go through the town.

metadata.Plot: Red Mathews and his gang are out to stop the railroad from coming to Coyote Gulch. When gunslinger Thunderbolt arrives in town, Banker Wingate tries to get him to take the job of kicking the gang out of town. Attracted to Judy Lane he accepts. He Succeeds once but is then captured just as the gang rides to town to break up the ceremony honoring the railroad president.
metadata.Writer: Alan James, Forrest Sheldon, Betty Burbridge
